text: Han, wɨram emŋgav mbɨkɨr oram erere we ui emŋgaŋ ndamɨr emampaŋg amar. Ave mbɨ mbɨkɨr wɨram kɨra ntɨŋ mamah ŋaŋɨnd hamb mbɨkɨr utuhutuh akŋ han werɨmŋgɨz are, mbɨ ndɨŋndɨv ntɨŋ pamuh pamuh rar ambɨroror eŋgwarɨmbɨmɨr amar. Ave mbɨ wɨram impikŋ wehɨrehɨrɨnd han kamɨr amar. Amez omanenta werɨv arar kamɨr amar.
